EmailTemplate.subject: This Month in Spring
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
July 2018 Hi, Spring fans! Welcome to another installment of This Month in Spring! This last month’s been absolutely nuts! Just as parts of Europe are winding down for summer holidays, much of the rest of the world starts getting crazy! Since we last spoke, I've been busy bringing Cloud Native Java anywhere and everywhere. I've been to NYC, US; Amsterdam, NL; London, UK; Paris, FR; Krakow, PL; São Paulo and Rio de Janeiro, BR; and Singapore, talking to developers hither-and-thou about all things Pivotal, Spring, and Cloud Native Java. Summer, it turns out, is a great time to talk about Spring! (Related: Can you believe we're past midyear already??)
The Long and short of it <[[https://content.pivotal.io/josh-blog/this-month-in-spring-july-2-2018?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-july-2018]]>
SpringOne Tour Keeps on Trucking
Much like aspiring actors, Santa Ana winds, and LeBron James, the SpringOne Tour bus is going to Los Angeles <[[https://springonetour.io/2018/los-angeles?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-july-2018]]> July 10–11, before making an abrupt U-turn to Chicago <[[https://springonetour.io/2018/chicago?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-july-2018]]>, August 28–29. If you can’t make these stops but still want a taste of what to expect at the main event <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-july-2018]]> this September in Washington, D.C., visit our tour page <[[https://springonetour.io/?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-july-2018]]> for more dates.
July 10–11 Los Angeles, CA <[[https://springonetour.io/2018/los-angeles?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-july-2018]]>
August 28–29 Chicago, IL <[[https://springonetour.io/2018/chicago?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-july-2018]]>
Put me in the front row <[[https://springonetour.io/?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-july-2018]]>
Register for S1P
The window for saving money on SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-july-2018]]> is closing, and closing fast. Watch your fingers! Why not make the most of the remaining time, with $200 off registration and reduced training prices until August 1, 2018 at 11:59 p.m. (PDT).
